name: Color Balloon
description:
Hello! Color Balloon is a game where you don't just control player, but controlling whole level. Combine paints to color your balloon and activate steamers to go through level. Dodge airships and helicopters to complete your adventure.

Game is on stage of prototype. And development is freezed. If you say that you like this game, I will try to develop it)

More information:

http://paovikistudios.com/2015/12/02/color-balloon-freezed/
